ActCanada Transportation Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectProgram to Advance Transportation Innovation
PrecisOrder Approving that the Minister of Transport ENTER into FUNDING AGREEMENTS with eligible recipients under the PROGRAM TO ADVANCE TRANSPORTATION INNOVATION, for a maximum amount of $500,000 per project.
